name: UP WE GO (FromDiegoG)
description:
General High Concept & Story

The game takes place in Modernia, where all inhabitants are high tech robots with sophisticated artifial inteligence. Recently they updated their laws vilely and started chasing any old technology machines remaining on the city to ensure every technology is innovative.

 

The player will control Tivi, an old TV that had been hiding from the government inside a forsaken building. Its efforts are useless and now has to escape as fast as possible or it will get melt by robotic weapons.

 

Jump to get away from the laser beam and collect all the coins you can! In this fast paced game every error is fatal. Do not be nervous and take care of your actions. Beat those highscores, too!

 

Main Features 

-       Futuristic Theme

-       Well-made characters and animations

-       Highscore mechanic

-       Very fast way of playing
